text: nāṁ dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷ ayakkunnatin namukk taṭas'samāyat pūrvvikanmār attaraṁ dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷe niṣēdhicc taḷḷikkaḷaññu ennat mātramāṇ‌. nāṁ thamūd samudāyattin pratyakṣa dr̥ṣṭāntamāyikkeāṇṭ oṭṭakatte nalkukayuṇṭāyi. enniṭṭ avar atinṟe kāryattil akramaṁ pravartticcu. bhayappeṭuttān mātramākunnu nāṁ dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷ ayakkunnat‌
